Contact our Speakers Bureau for Gina Torres’s booking fee, appearance cost, speaking price,

data.meta_site_name: Celebrity Speakers For Speaking Engagements | Speaker Booking Agency
data.text:
Gina Torres Biography

Gina Torres is an American television and movie actress. The youngest of three children Torres was born in Manhattan and raised in The Bronx with her close-knit Cuban family. She graduated from Fiorello LaGuardia School of Arts where before entering the world of acting she studied opera and jazz as a vocal major.Within a year of graduating she was cast as Deena Jones in Dreamgirls her first professional acting job. It wasn’t long before she started appearing on Broadway being directed by such legends as Tommy Tune and Pete Masterson in Best Little Whorehouse Goes Public and Jerry Zaks in Face Value.She began her onscreen career with roles on “Law & Order” “One Life to Live” “Any Day Now” and “La Femme Nikita” but it was her collaboration with producers Sam Raimi and Rob Tapert on four different shows – “MANTIS” “Hercules: The Legendary Journeys” “Xena: Warrior Princess” and “Cleopatra 2525 that brought her to the masses and promptly shifted her career.Torres played a main role on the USA Network series Suits as Jessica Pearson for the first seven seasons. She reprised the role in the drama Pearson a spin-off about Jessica Pearson moving to Chicago and becoming involved in politics.

Book Gina Torres Now!

As a renowned expert and highly sought-after speaker, Gina Torres's expertise is in high demand. To book Gina Torres for your next event, conference, or workshop, please contact our speaker booking agency. Our experienced team will work closely with you to understand your specific needs and help secure Gina Torres's participation. With our professional guidance and seamless booking process, you can ensure a memorable and impactful experience for your audience. Don't miss the opportunity to engage your audience with Gina Torres's compelling insights and inspire positive change within your organization. Fill out the booking request form to take the first step in securing Gina Torres for your next speaking engagement.
